casebody.data:
February 6, 1950.*

Per Curiam Decisions.

No. 497. Burton, doing business as A. B. Burton Co., v. United States et al. W. G. Burnette for appellant. Daniel W. Knowlton for the Interstate Commerce Commission, appellee.

Mr. Justice Douglas took no part in the consideration or decision of the cases in which judgments or orders were this day announced.

 Per Curiam:

The motion to affirm is granted and the judgment is affirmed.
